spells.name: Mutagenic Touch
spells.description: You can pass a weaker version of your mutagen to another creature.

spells.name: Tongues, Communal
spells.description: As tongues, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Viper Bomb Admixture
spells.description: Empowers bombs you throw to summon poisonous biting vipers that bite those hit or splashed by the bomb.
